com.revolsys.util
Class JavaBeanUtil

java.lang.Object
  com.revolsys.util.JavaBeanUtil

public final class JavaBeanUtil
extends Object

The JavaBeanUtil is a utility class that provides methods to set/get properties from an object with no checked exceptions thrown.

Author:
Paul Austin

public static <T> T getProperty(Object object,

Get the value of the named propery from the object. Any exceptions are wrapped as runtime exceptions.

Parameters:
object - The object.
propertyName - The name of the property.

The property value.
